title: Meeting the Dragon
description: A summons in the middle of the night has Shaman Lisa Reed unexpectedly on the front lines of an unknown enemy. When Dragon Touched, Max Tau is brought in by the Sidhe, Lisa finds herself unexpectedly and instantly attracted. Together they need to walk the line between their desire for each other, and battling an ancient enemy.  WARNING: While this story is a slow burner, this book contains scenes of a sexual nature and is not intended for readers under 18.
author: Louise Meyers
